en-US.name: Meal Advisor
en-US.summary: A skill that recommends meals and restaurants
en-US.description: Get personalized meal and restaurant recommendations based on your preferences.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Meal Advisor to recommend a dish
Alexa, tell Meal Advisor to find me an Italian restaurant

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test the skill by asking for meal recommendations or saving preferences.
